de.kwsoft.mtext.converter.gof

Class OtfConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.kwsoft.mtext.converter.gof.OtfConverter

  • public final class OtfConverter
extends java.lang.Object
    Renders a SAP GOF Output Text Format document to a specified format.
    Author:
    Jens Rehbach

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String... args)
                 throws OtfConverterException
        Executes the conversion.
        Parameters:
        args - the command line arguments.
        Throws:
        OtfConverterException - if the conversion fails.

      • convertFile

        public static void convertFile(java.nio.file.Path inputFile,
                               java.nio.file.Path outputFile,
                               java.nio.file.Path headerOutputFile,
                               java.lang.String format,
                               de.kwsoft.mtext.format.intermediate.MTextIFRendererFactory mTextIFRendererFactory,
                               java.util.List<CommandFilter> filterList)
                        throws OtfConverterException
        Converts a file.
        Parameters:
        inputFile - the file to be converted.
        outputFile - the rendered file to be written.
        headerOutputFile - the xml output file for the header values or null if the header should not be written.
        format - the target format of the rendered file.
        mTextIFRendererFactory - the renderer factory to be used or null.
        filterList - list of filters to apply or null.
        Throws:
        OtfConverterException - if the conversion fails.

      • convertDirectory

        public static void convertDirectory(java.nio.file.Path inputDirectory,
                                    java.lang.String fileSuffix,
                                    java.nio.file.Path outputDirectory,
                                    boolean writeHeaderToXml,
                                    java.lang.String format,
                                    de.kwsoft.mtext.format.intermediate.MTextIFRendererFactory mTextIFRendererFactory,
                                    java.util.List<CommandFilter> filterList)
                             throws OtfConverterException
        Converts a bunch of files.
        Parameters:
        inputDirectory - the input directory.
        fileSuffix - the file suffix of the input files to be considered.
        outputDirectory - the output directory.
        writeHeaderToXml - should the header xml file be written?
        format - the target format of the files to be rendered.
        mTextIFRendererFactory - the renderer factory to be used or null.
        filterList - list of filters to apply or null.
        Throws:
        OtfConverterException - if the conversion fails.

      • getRendererFactory

        public static de.kwsoft.mtext.format.intermediate.MTextIFRendererFactory getRendererFactory()
                                                                                     throws OtfConverterException
        Returns a new MTextIFRendererFactory for performance optimization, so that the factory is only created once and then reused.
        Returns:
        a new MTextIFRendererFactory.
        Throws:
        OtfConverterException - if the factory could not be created.

      • getCommandFilter

        public static java.util.List<CommandFilter> getCommandFilter(java.util.List<java.lang.String> commandFilterClassNames)
                                                      throws OtfConverterException
        Returns the list of command filter to be applied.
        Parameters:
        commandFilterClassNames - the list of command filter class names or null.
        Returns:
        the list of command filter to be applied or null.
        Throws:
        OtfConverterException - if one of the command filters could not be loaded.

      • addCommandFilter

        public void addCommandFilter(CommandFilter filter)
        Adds the given command filter to the end of the filter chain.
        Parameters:
        filter - the command filter to be added.

      • loadDocument

        public OtfDocument loadDocument(java.nio.file.Path otfFile)
                         throws OtfConverterException
        Loads the specified OTF document.
        Parameters:
        otfFile - the OTF document to be read.
        Returns:
        the read document.
        Throws:
        OtfConverterException - if the document could not be read.

        Parameters:

        outputFile - the rendered file to be written.
        headerOutputFile - the xml output file for the header values or null if the header should not be written.

        mTextIFRendererFactory - the renderer factory to be used or null.
